body_text:
Should we respect a user-set empty value in case privacy add-ons want to get rid of it? That may be a question for outside of this PR.

I doubt there are many privacy sensitive people that will be ok with Normandy as a whole, but not this particular part.
body:
> Should we respect a user-set empty value in case privacy add-ons want to get rid of it? That may be a question for outside of this PR.

I doubt there are many privacy sensitive people that will be ok with Normandy as a whole, but not this particular part.
body_html:
Should we respect a user-set empty value in case privacy add-ons want to get rid of it? That may be a question for outside of this PR.

I doubt there are many privacy sensitive people that will be ok with Normandy as a whole, but not this particular part.
